snippet: Tucked into the Metropolitan Museum of Art's American Wing is a hallway with 15 panels displaying about 60 baseball cards of some of the first black players in the major leagues.
abstract: Tucked into the Metropolitan Museum of Art's American Wing is a hallway with 15 panels displaying about 60 baseball cards of some of the first black players in the major leagues.

headline.main: Celebrating Robinson and Other Black Players, on the Field and in an Exhibit Hall
